member.name: D3D11_ENCRYPTED_BLOCK_INFO
member.summary: Specifies which bytes in a video surface are encrypted.

member.name: D3D11_ENCRYPTED_BLOCK_INFO.NumEncryptedBytesAtBeginning
member.summary: The number of bytes that are encrypted at the start of the buffer.

member.name: D3D11_ENCRYPTED_BLOCK_INFO.NumBytesInSkipPattern
member.summary: The number of bytes that are skipped after the first NumEncryptedBytesAtBeginning bytes, and then after each block of NumBytesInEncryptPattern bytes. Skipped bytes are not encrypted.

member.name: D3D11_ENCRYPTED_BLOCK_INFO.NumBytesInEncryptPattern
member.summary: The number of bytes that are encrypted after each block of skipped bytes.
